title: Get Your Brooms Ready
description: The whole gang is back in the Lab to discuss what a potential sweep will do for the Warriors "dynasty" and LeBron's legacy. We also re-evaluate Finals MVP candidates and more.
itunes:title: Get Your Brooms Ready
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: The whole gang is back in the Lab to discuss what a potential sweep will do for the Warriors "dynasty" and LeBron's legacy. We also re-evaluate Finals MVP candidates and more.
